column1: Correctly refered to someone as a "Script Kiddie"
Read several writings by Richard Stallman
Use sudo to enter a protected folder
Used chown to make a file executable
Scraped a flash game off of a site
Helped a fellow student to find a bug in their program
Complete the Lightbot Challenge
Taught another student how to use terminal for seeing hidden files
Remix a midi song
Used a text editor to write a program
Read "Cuckoos Egg"
Wrote a correct nested loop
Improved an article on Wikipedia
Used an IDE like Eclipse on a Med size project
Used telnet to connect to some website server and explored stuff
Successfully used HTML form injection to put LOLz data into database
Translated a program into another language
Learned how the L-System works
Added animation to someone's svg file
Compiled a program from scratch using make
Learned how RSA encryption works
Installed applications using command line package manager
Used wget to download an entire wobsite
Created local repository of pre-existing code using svn or git
Used FTP or SFTP to obtain a file (without a browser)
Skillfully converted bitmap image to svg format
Created a CSS theme for a website
Served as Computer Club officer at SHS
Used a Linux Live CD to access Mac or Windows files
Did a reverse Fourier transformation to determine a music note or chord
Correctly used recursive backtracking in a function
Downloaded and used the NLTK
Wrote a Quine
Beat Mr. G at Backgammon
